Pātaka Raraunga

Find data for and about Māori.

Improve Māori wellbeing through better, data-informed decisions.

Data is a taonga.

To work towards a better future, we need to understand how and why the world is changing.

Data is a vital tool to help us understand, measure, manage, and assess issues and the impact of the changes we make.

It's about more than the bottom line.

For Māori business, iwi, hapu, and community groups, money isn't everything. It's about people. It's about the land and the water. It's about the future.

Explore data about your community

Pātaka Raraunga brings together data, tools, and reports on Te Ao Māori. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

Dig into data on health, wellbeing, Papatūānuku, and more. Read reports on the value of data to Māoridom, Māori data sovereignty, and other topics. And explore tools and other resources made for or by Māori.

Explore topics and charts

See interactive charts, data sources, definitions, and how and why data was collected. Take and use charts and data for free.

Try out tools

Use interactive data tools to examine issues like the impacts of COVID-19 on different types of jobs.

Read reports and presentations

Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of Te Ao Māori through the lens of data

Find Business Figures

Explore data specific to your industries of work, workforce, and customer base.
